resources.string: Offers auto renewable subscription, %1$s after trial. No commitment. Cancel any time.
At the end of free trial period, subscription will be auto renew. Recurring billing, Cancel any time on Google play store.
Subscription automatically renews. Cancel anytime or\nRestore Purchase | Details
For further information, please check out our Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions

• Enjoy an ad-free experience with your Cat-Proxy subscription.

 • Once you confirm your purchase, your subscription will be managed through the Google Play Store.

 • If you cancel your subscription, you will retain access until the end of the current billing period.

 • Your subscription will automatically renew unless you disable auto-renewal at least 24 hours before the current period ends.

 • You can manage your subscription or turn off auto-renewal directly in the Google Play Store settings.

 • If you cancel your subscription during the trial period, you would not be charged.
